title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Episode 4 – Arsenic and Old Lace
description:
May 14, 2018 / A variety of experts explain why Dorian’s ingestion of 3-Nitro was the likely cause of his arsenic poisoning.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon. Additional scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Kai Engel and Nctrnm.

This episode was sponsored by Quicken Loans and Starkey Hearing Foundation.

Quicken Loans - www.RocketMortgage.com/Undisclosed 

Starkey Hearing Foundation – www.ListenInCampaign.org 

#undisclosed #freepamlanier
